definition: so (Cantonese)/Mandarin equivalent: 這樣|这样[zhe4 yang4]
mouth/classifier for things with mouths (people, domestic animals, cannons, wells etc)/classifier for bites or mouthfuls
surname Gan/abbr. for Gansu Province 甘肅省|甘肃省[Gan1 su4 Sheng3]
sweet/willing

sentences.english: If I attack you like this, how would you defend me?
sentences.chinese: 如果我咁樣攻擊你，你會點樣擋隔？

sentences.english: And make the duck breast not too oily.
sentences.chinese: 話梅酸酸好開胃，仲令鴨胸無咁膩。

sentences.english: They say she plays guitar and cries and sings.
sentences.chinese: 大家都話她識彈結他，又識鬼咁叫同唱歌仔。

sentences.english: But someone set a goal and try his best to achieve it.
sentences.chinese: 而系，一個人定咗一個目標，並好努力咁去實現。

sentences.english: Do you think this year's District Council Election was corruption-free?
sentences.chinese: 你認爲今屆區議會選舉系唔系廉潔咁進行？

sentences.english: Sounde weird to me what on earth is this wine?
sentences.chinese: 我好奇怪，點解會有罎咁嘅酒。

sentences.english: I love you forever with all my heart.
sentences.chinese: 我永遠刀會全心全意咁去愛你。

sentences.english: Now should I keep going or should we call truce?
sentences.chinese: 好了，咁依家我地繼續打仗定系叫返個暫停先呢？

sentences.english: How about the political development issues?
Then, how can men find their women?
sentences.chinese: 咁，男人點樣先搵到個女人系隔離？

sentences.english: If I wait for three years, I will marry you.
sentences.chinese: 一世咁長等多你幾年又如何？

sentences.english: Why is there so much trouble?
sentences.chinese: 魜點解會有咁多嘎煩惱？

sentences.english: Plum is sour and appetizing . And make the duck breast not too oily.
sentences.chinese: 話梅酸酸好開胃，仲令鴨胸無咁膩。

sentences.english: This is an English (activity). Using English is better, I think.
sentences.chinese: 咁呢個系英文，梗系用英文好的啦我覺得。

sentences.english: I dun know what can I say now.
sentences.chinese: 咁我而家問你，點解你唔講出呢呀？

sentences.english: But I think it would be a good birthday present…
sentences.chinese: 多謝先，咁破費呀，我十月生日，你儲定錢剛剛好。

definition: he (Cantonese)/Mandarin equivalent: 他[ta1]
old variant of 慨[kai3]/to sigh (with emotion)
possessive particle (Cantonese)/Mandarin equivalent: 的[de5]
used in transliteration
some/few/a little (Cantonese)
Cantonese particle equivalent to 了[le5] or 過|过[guo4]
to connect/to relate to/to tie up/to bind/to be (literary)
to be at, in or on (Cantonese)/Mandarin equivalent: 在[zai4]
what? (Cantonese)/Mandarin equivalent: 什麼|什么[shen2 me5]
correct/suitable/to suit sb/just now (Cantonese)
(literary) to wipe away (tears)/to press with one's fingers/to soak
to look for (Cantonese)/Mandarin equivalent: 找[zhao3]
to look down upon (classical)/to see/to look at (Cantonese)/Mandarin equivalent: 看[kan4]
to know/to reprimand/to urge/to long for/to tell/to inform
home/family (Cantonese)/Mandarin equivalent: 家[jia1]
thing/matter (Cantonese)/see also 乜嘢[mie1 ye3]
to squint/what? (Cantonese)/see also 乜嘢[mie1 ye3]
phonetic ga (used in rendering Tibetan and Mongolian sounds)/Tibetan Ge: language of Buddha/(dialect) final particle similar to 了[le5] (esp. in Yunnan)
